DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate immunogenicity safety inactivate , non adjuvanted A ( H1N1 ) v influenza vaccine 120 pregnant woman . Study procedures include 2 dos vaccine , blood sample , cord blood sample delivery record temperature vaccine side effect memory aid 7 day follow vaccination . Participants involve study related procedure 3 5 month .
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity Safety Inactivated Non-adjuvanted A ( H1N1 ) v Influenza Vaccine Pregnant Women
DOC.criteria: 18 year 45 year Pregnancy 22 32 week gestation Provides write informed consent Covered French Social Security Allergy eggs component vaccine History severe reaction follow previous influenza vaccine H1N1 influenza ( virologically document ) last 6 month Febrile episode within one week prior vaccination Known HIV , HBV , HCV infection Multiple sclerosis History GuillainBarr√© syndrome Organ transplant recipient Neoplastic disease past 3 year Other vaccine within 3 week prior study entry plan within month follow last injection Systemic corticosteroid , immunotherapy , chemotherapy Anticoagulant treatment Immunoglobulin blood transfusion within 3 month prior enrollment study History cardiac disease Chronic liver disease Diabetes pregnancy History premature delivery History eclampsia Fetal morphologic abnormality
